site_title: Modular Spinning Toy by Robert E. Neale

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is the simplest modular origami ever. It's the modular origami spinning toy by Robert E. Neale. It's made by assembling 6 water bomb bases together. You should really try it out. Here at Heap Art, we are trying to inspire people to connect with each other through origami and paper folding. Subscribe to my channel to receive something new every week. If you like Paper Airplanes and you like Origami. Please subscribe to my channel using the link below: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwVrmDKZhN9C22O8lzHRFCA?sub_confirmation=1 Below is the time table of the Tutorial! 0:00 Model Demo 0:11 Folding The Module 1:27 Module Time lapse 1:40 Model Assembly
